dcterms:creator: M. Gygli
H. Grabner
H. Riemenschneider
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: The SumMe dataset is a collection of 25 videos that cover a variety of events (e.g. sports, holidays, etc.). The videos in SumMe are 1.5 to 6.5 minutes in length.
dcterms:title: SumMe

dcterms:creator: Y. Song
J. Vallmitjana
A. Stent
A. Jaimes
dcterms:description: The TVSum dataset contains 50 YouTube videos of 10 different categories (e.g. making sandwich, dog show, changing vehicle tire, etc.) from the TRECVid Multimedia Event Detection (MED) task. The videos in this dataset are typically 1 to 5 minutes in length.
dcterms:title: TVSum

dcterms:creator: S.E.F. De Avila
A.P.B. Lopes
A. da Luz
A. de Albuquerque Ara√∫jo
dcterms:description: The YouTube dataset consists of videos including news, sports, and cartoons, used to augment training data for video summarization.
dcterms:title: YouTube dataset

dcterms:description: The Open Video Project (OVP) dataset contains videos of different genres such as documentaries, used to augment training data for video summarization.
dcterms:title: Open Video Project (OVP)
